General.Name: Chelverton UK Dividend Trust PLC
General.Description: Chelverton Small Companies Dividend Trust plc is an open-ended equity mutual fund launched and managed by Chelverton Asset Management Limited. The fund primarily invests in the public equity markets of the United Kingdom. It seeks to invest in stocks of companies operating across diversified sectors. The fund primarily invests in the stocks of small-cap companies with market capitalization of less than £500m. The fund was formerly known as Small Companies Dividend Trust Plc. Chelverton Small Companies Dividend Trust plc was formed on May 12, 1999 and is domiciled in the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 11 Laura Place, Bath, United Kingdom, BA2 4BL
